DOC.detailed_description: Survey : If agree take part study , complete survey health practice knowledge cervical cancer HPV . You also ask provide personal history age , gender , birthplace , ethnicity , relationship status educational level . Female participant ask indicate receive HPV test ( also call `` Pap '' test ) within last 3 year . The survey take 5-10 minute complete fill day focus group . Focus Group : You also take part discussion group call `` focus group . '' A trained focus group leader guide 8-10 others series question . He/she lead discussion hear comment , opinion , observation brochure poster cervical cancer HPV . Groups make participant gender ( , male female ) ethnic group ( Filipino , Korean , Vietnamese ) . Each discussion group last 2 hour may audiotaped discussion may transcribe analyzed . You call first name require use real name focus group discussion . You identify audiotape recording . Length Study : When focus group discussion , off-study . This investigational study . Up 60 participant enrol study . All enrol M. D. Anderson .
